mapper.sql: id, pid, name, value, icon, type, uri, status, create_time, sort
mapper.select: select up.id, up.pid, up.name, up.value, up.icon, up.type, up.uri, up.status, up.create_time, up.sort from ums_admin ua inner join ums_admin_permission_relation upa inner join ums_permission up on ua.id = upa.admin_id and upa.permission_id = up.id where ua.id = #{adminId}

select up.id, up.pid, up.name, up.value, up.icon, up.type, up.uri, up.status, up.create_time, up.sort from ums_admin ua inner join ums_admin_role_relation uarr inner join ums_role ur inner join ums_role_permission_relation urpr inner join ums_permission up on ua.id = uarr.admin_id and uarr.role_id = ur.id and ur.id = urpr.permission_id and urpr.permission_id = up.id where ua.id = #{adminId}
